definitions.text: (Roman Catholic Church) one of a group of more than 100 prominent bishops in the Sacred College who advise the Pope and elect new Popes
the number of elements in a mathematical set; denotes a quantity but not the order
a variable color averaging a vivid red
crested thick-billed North American finch having bright red plumage in the male

examples: the central cause of the problem
an example that was fundamental to the argument
computers are fundamental to modern industrial structure

definitions.text: being or denoting a numerical quantity but not order
